text: Nena, “Kodi ife tizipembedza ena powonjezera pa Mulungu amene sangathe kutithandiza kapena kutiwononga ndipo kodi ife tibwerere m’mbuyo pamene Mulungu watitsogolera? Monga ngati munthu amene alodzedwa ndi Satana, kumangoyenda uku ndi uku ngakhale kuti abwenzi ake ali kumuitana kuti atsatire njira yoyenera, ponena: Bwerani kuno?” Nena, “Ndithudi utsogoleri wa Mulungu ndiwo utsogoleri weniweni ndipo Ife talamulidwa kugonjera Mulungu Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse.”
